message.content:
{"id": "16938", 
"title": "Bug 16938DCR: Class File Editor should scroll more naturally", 
"description": "20020521 (F1)(This may not be a debug PRI wasn't sure). So the workaround, ifthe user wants to scroll through the Class File editor, is to always use thethumb.", 
"OB": "When scrolling through the Class File editor, the editor only scrolls about a line at a time instead of scrolling a page at a time. The user needs to use the thumb for smooth scrolling.", 
"EB": "When scrolling through the Class File editor, it should scroll one line at a time when the user clicks on the arrows or clicks on the scrollbar's background to scroll a page at a time. Currently, it only scrolls about a line at a time.", 
"SR": "Modify the Class File Editor to enable smooth scrolling when clicking on the arrows or the scrollbar's background, allowing it to scroll one line at a time or a page at a time."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '16938', 'title': 'Bug 16938DCR: Class File Editor should scroll more naturally', 'description': "20020521 (F1)(This may not be a debug PRI wasn't sure). So the workaround, ifthe user wants to scroll through the Class File editor, is to always use thethumb. ", 'OB': '', 'EB': "Bug 16938DCR: Class File Editor should scroll more naturally It should scroll one lineat a time when you click on the arrows. click on the scrollbar's background to scroll a page at a timeProblem: the editor only scrolls about a line at a time when it should bescrolling a page at a time.Grabbing the thumb and scrolling with that works well. ", 'SR': ''}
